# NSTextField.BezelStyle.squareBezel

**Case**

A style that draws a bezel with square corners around a text field.

## Declaration

```swift
case squareBezel
```

## Constants

- **NSTextField.BezelStyle.roundedBezel**: A style that draws a bezel with rounded corners around a single-line text field.

items.description: A style that draws a bezel with rounded corners around a single-line text field.
